values: The Path and the Price of Pursuing the Glory of God Among the NationsThe Path and the Price of Pursuing the Glory of God Among the Nations

Filling up what is lacking in Christ’s afflictions means that we embrace suffering for the sake of bringing a personal presentation of the sufferings of Christ to the nations.
